title: Benefits Of Getting Vaccinated
content:
To date, the systems in place to monitor the safety of COVID-19 vaccines currently used in the United States have identified anaphylaxis and myocarditis or pericarditis as serious types of adverse events following COVID-19 vaccination. Other rare events, such as
Guillain-Barr√© syndrome (GBS)
, are also monitored for and studied.
Read more about COVID-19 vaccine safety
After vaccination
Learn what you can do after vaccination to protect your family from COVID-19 in CDC's
